TEXT.TITLE: <ASSOCIATES CORP OF NORTH AMERICA> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:
Qtr ended Jan 31 Net 55.3 mln dlrs vs 51.7 mln dlrs Revs 419.1 mln vs 391.7 mln Note: Revs include investment and other income of 18.4 mln dlrs vs 18.5 mln dlrs. Company is wholly owned by Gulf and Western Corp <GW>.
Reuter
